name: Mustaqil.com
tag_list: jordan, lebanon, qatar, uae, dubai, egypt, abu-dhabi, tunisia, morocco, freelancing, arabic, php, photoshop, vb, asp-net, visual-basic, translation
overview:
Mustaqil.com is an online freelancing marketplace targeting individuals & companies from all around the globe to utilize Arab freelancers as outsourcing partners.

Mustaqil.com allows individuals and companies to showcase their credentials and for project owners to benefit from a reduced cost for the realization of their projects.

The project owner and freelancer can communicate and conduct project operations in a safe and reliable environment by using project management tools on the website,

Escrowing the money online eliminates the risk of receiving or sending the money for an incomplete or unsatisfying (in the terms of the contract) project.

With proper user rating and increased competition the project manager is able to choose the best-suited freelancer for a specific job.

Freelancing happens on a daily basis, Mustaqil.com guarantees its freelancers and buyers more reach, exposure and security while at a very competitive commission fee.
